lead_paragraph: SeaWorld and California regulators have agreed on a settlement over accusations that the park failed to train workers to safely interact with its killer whales.
snippet: SeaWorld and California regulators have agreed on a settlement over accusations that the park failed to train workers to safely interact with its killer whales.

headline.main: Seaworld and California Settle Charges Involving Killer Whales
headline.print_headline: Seaworld And California Settle Charges Involving Killer Whales
